alert.note: Alert for Sweetwater (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:29PM MDT until July 03 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL SWEETWATER COUNTY... At 425 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was moving along Interstate 80, currently 19 miles west of Wamsutter, moving east toward Wamsutter at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 420 PM MDT, 70 mph was reported near the Bitter Creek Rest Area. IMPACT...Expect tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Wamsutter, Bitter Creek Rest Area, Red Desert, Bitter Creek and Tipton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 134 and 176. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
